title: No objects under Context in palette when scripting a data set
OB: When attempting to script a data set, there are no objects displayed under the Context section in the palette.
EB: I expect to see a list of objects under the Context section in the palette when scripting a data set. Specifically, the object 'BeforeOpen' should be listed as well.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the software.
2. Open a data set to script.
3. Open the palette.
4. Navigate to the Context section in the palette.
5. Observe that there are no objects listed under Context.
